title: Yuri!!! on Ice The Movie: Ice Adolescence
alternative_title: ユーリ!!! on ICE 劇場版 : ICE ADOLESCENCE（アイス アドレセンス）
description: YURI!!! on ICE the movie : ICE ADOLESCENCE (Japanese: ユーリ!!! on ICE 劇場版 : ICE ADOLESCENCE, Yūri!!! on Ice Gekijō-ban: Aisu Adoresensu) is a Japanese sports anime film about figure skating, and is a possible prequel to the 2016 anime television series, Yuri!!! on Ice.
